computing_environment: Linux (Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.4); Mac OS X (darwin x86_64 m64)
data_usage: Decadal average temperature anomalies (difference between the decade and the 1901-1960 average temperature) for the Hawaii region were plotted as a bar graph. Note: the far right bar contains data for 12 years (2001-2012).
methodology: Annual mean temperatures were averaged for all gridpoints in the Hawaii region. Decadal averages were then calculated. Finally the 1901-1960 average temperature was subtracted from the decadal average temperature.
notes: Fortran 95 was used to perform numerical calculations. IDL was used to visualize the data.
output_artifacts:
grid-mntp-1880-current-v3.2.1.dat
read-t2m.f
decade-t2m.f
Hawaii-decade-t2m
temp_precip_decadal_averages.pro
HI.dec_avg.temp_ANN.txt
temp_precip_decadal_barchart.pro
HI_temp_anom_1901-2012_ANN.eps
